title: fix links to bl.ocks

do we want to create notebooks? or defer to another block viewer in the meantime?


Also this link has changed: https://d3js.org/d3-selection/joining => http://bost.ocks.org/mike/bar/2/ is now redirected to https://observablehq.com/@d3/lets-make-a-bar-chart/2
